mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jmes.TBL_DRAWING_UPLOAD (WORK_KEY, GFILE_SEQ, FILE_TYPE, MAPPING_STR, DXF_GFILE_SEQ, PDF_GFILE_SEQ, IMG_GFILE_SEQ, SUCCESS, MESSAGE) VALUES (#{WORK_KEY}, #{GFILE_SEQ}, #{FILE_TYPE}, #{MAPPING_STR}, #{DXF_GFILE_SEQ}, #{PDF_GFILE_SEQ}, #{IMG_GFILE_SEQ}, #{SUCCESS}, #{MESSAGE})
mapper.select: SELECT UUID() AS ROW_NUM, C.ORGINAL_FILE_NM, C.FILE_EXT, C.FILE_SIZE, A.MAPPING_STR, A.MESSAGE, A.SUCCESS, A.DXF_GFILE_SEQ, A.PDF_GFILE_SEQ, A.IMG_GFILE_SEQ FROM jmes.TBL_DRAWING_UPLOAD A INNER JOIN jmes.TBL_FILE_GROUP B ON A.GFILE_SEQ = B.GFILE_SEQ INNER JOIN jmes.TBL_FILE C ON B.GFILE_SEQ = C.GFILE_SEQ WHERE A.WORK_KEY = #{WORK_KEY} ORDER BY A.ORGINAL_FILE_NM

SELECT UUID() AS ROW_NUM, A.CONTROL_SEQ, A.CONTROL_NUM, A.CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ, A.ITEM_NM, A.PART_NUM, A.ORDER_SEQ, A.ORDER_NUM, A.DRAWING_NUM, A.DRAWING_VER, DATE_FORMAT(A.DRAWING_UP_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS DRAWING_UP_DT, A.DXF_GFILE_SEQ, A.PDF_GFILE_SEQ, A.IMG_GFILE_SEQ FROM jmes.TBL_DRAWING_UPLOAD_CONTROL A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.WORK_KEY = #{WORK_KEY} ORDER BY A.CONTROL_SEQ, A.CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ, A.ORDER_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_CONTROL_PART SET DRAWING_UP_DT = NOW(), DXF_GFILE_SEQ = #{DXF_GFILE_SEQ}, PDF_GFILE_SEQ = #{PDF_GFILE_SEQ}, IMG_GFILE_SEQ = #{IMG_GFILE_SEQ}, UPDATE_DT = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = #{LOGIN_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONTROL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_SEQ} AND CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ}

UPDATE TBL_CONTROL_PART SET DRAWING_VER = IFNULL(DRAWING_VER, 0) + 1, DRAWING_UP_DT = NOW(), PREV_DRAWING_NUM = DRAWING_NUM, DXF_GFILE_SEQ = #{DXF_GFILE_SEQ}, PDF_GFILE_SEQ = #{PDF_GFILE_SEQ}, IMG_GFILE_SEQ = #{IMG_GFILE_SEQ}, UPDATE_DT = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = #{LOGIN_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONTROL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_SEQ} AND CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ}

INSERT INTO jmes.TBL_CONTROL_BARCODE (BARCODE_NUM, CONTROL_SEQ, CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ, CONTROL_VER, DRAWING_VER, DEL_YN, INSERT_ID) SELECT CONCAT('C', LPAD(NEXTVAL(SEQ_BARCODE), 9, '0')) as BARCODE_NUM, A.CONTROL_SEQ, B.CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ, A.CONTROL_VER, IFNULL(B.DRAWING_VER, 1), 'N' AS DEL_YN, #{LOGIN_USER_ID} AS INSERT_ID FROM jmes.TBL_CONTROL A INNER JOIN jmes.TBL_CONTROL_PART B ON A.CONTROL_SEQ = B.CONTROL_SEQ AND B.CONTROL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_SEQ} AND B.CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ = #{CONTROL_DETAIL_SEQ} WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
